Topic.Title: Changing the order of page links/exits in a Gamebook

Posts.EditableText:
I have another silly question.

I want to reorder the exit links on certain pages.

Most of the the time when I add several exits to a new page or links to existing ones when I play the game the links will show up in the order I added them. Sometimes, however, it seems nothing I do, even deleting the links and writing them in again in the order I want them to show up, will change the order, like Quest has an internal rule for determining exit order I'm not aware of.

Any ideas? Thank you!
Posts.HTML:
